subject: P1: Migrate rules/ details to skills
description: Move detailed content from rules/ to skills for progressive disclosure: (1) Firecrawl patterns from tool-selection.md → existing web scraping skill, (2) Debug details from execution-guard.md → debugging-guide skill, (3) Refactoring details from execution-guard.md → refactoring-guide skill. Slim down rules/ to core principles only.
